title: [Animal Science] Dog owners likely to report better emotional health during Covid-19 pandemic, study shows

[Medicine] Antibody-like proteins known as VNARs -- derived from the immune systems of sharks -- can prevent the SARS-COV-2 & its variants from infecting human cells. But the findings have so far only been seen in the lab and VNAR treatments have not yet been tested in humans, the investigators stressed.
